how to how to configure firefox to setup: i installed the squid,but dont know how to configure the browser
edit->preferences->advanced->network
and then you want the "connection settings"
which should let you put in a proxy
ya,i know that.but about the proxy address,url and other things
well that depends on how & where you have set up the proxy :)
is it another machine?
or locally?
Orteko:i cant understand.all i want is to use proxy server to speed up my internet access
in that case the best option is to use your isp's proxy server if they have one
if you check their website it should have information about it if they have one
Orteko:i dont know if my ISP provider has a proxy server
Orteko:i think they dont have one
if they don't have one you could set one up locally, but if you are the only one using it there isn't going to be very much benefit
all it will do is cache information that you've already accessed, and that information will probably still be in your firefox cache next time anyway
Orteko:i'm the only one who's going to use it. nobody is connected to my network
not really a lot of point in having one then, it would probably be far simpler to just increase the size of your cache in firefox
Orteko:so the proxy server is of no use to me
correct - with only one person using it, it's not much use.
just goto edit->preferences->advanced->network and increase your disk space size for caching
it will have much the same effect
